text:
Lenka von Koerber (born Helene Irmgard Louise von der Leyen 16 March 1888 West Prussia – July 21, 1958 Leipzig) was a German journalist and writer.
Life.
She joined the peace movement, and from 1918 to 1930 the German Democratic Party. She advocated for prison reform. She was a member of Deutscher Schriftstellerverband.
